article.title: Pragmatics Receives Task Order from Defense Information Systems Agency
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Pragmatics Incorporated has been awarded a task order by the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA) Net-Enabled Command Capability (NECC) Component Program Management Office (CPMO) to provide technical and operational support for the DISA NECC CPMO in its Joint Force Project capability transition. The one-year, firm-fixed-price task order is valued at $641,000.
